root: ^Deranged Handwriting: How long... has it been without meeting anyone? How long...until I reach the top. It may be the effects of the tower, but I may be hallucinating... The blocks.. they seem to move whenever I change my perspective...
^Deranged Handwriting: The way the blocks move allow me to reach different locations. I have to keep changing my perspective, and try and try again. Whatever it takes...
